accomplishments:
*Started the big push for AI use in the Cyber teams documentations - I was constantly looking on how to implement AI in a reusable method, which allowed the Cyber team to produce better documentations.
*Contributed greatly to security Controls SOPs - Started the process for generating SOP with help of AI, created prompt findings and documentation to help team contribute to documentation generation.
*Provided training to new members of cyber- was able to quickly setup new members with tools , documentation, and processes.
enps_comments:
**Jeremy Steinbeck:**
While Ben has a solid foundational skill set and a willingness to learn the primary concern is the gap between effort and delivered outcomes. To be an A Player, results must be consistent. Currently, execution and communication gaps frequently introduce unnecessary risk and impact our team's ability to demonstrate Outcomes in Production. Ben needs to take greater ownership of the full cycle of work, from acceptance through to communicating the final impact.

**Samuel McQueen:**
Ben is a rising star within Rise8, his technical knowledge and dedication to the success of the program is outstanding. He consistently takes on difficult, and thankless task that enables the team to work efficiently and provide outcomes to the customer.

**Octavia Leon:**
Ben’s been crushing it as an ISSE on the cyber team showing up strong and putting his technical skills to work to get the FORGE cyber environment fully dialed in. He’s always willing to jump in, troubleshoot, and share knowledge to help others get unstuck. His willingness to mentor and support anyone who asks really stands out, and it’s clear he takes pride in elevating the whole team, not just his own work. Ben brings the right mix of technical depth, initiative, and teamwork exactly what you want in a senior engineer.
start_stop_keep:
**Jeremy Steinbeck:**
> Continue to demonstrate your strong Growth Mindset. Your receptiveness to feedback and drive to develop your abilities when facing challenges are excellent. Additionally, maintaining your consistent "Always Be Kind" approach in all interactions is crucial for fostering a healthy team environment.Continue to explore innovative, non-traditional approaches for leveraging AI and technology in our cybersecurity practice.You must adopt a more proactive approach to communication, particularly with challenging and unresponsive customers. Furthermore, I expect you to take on additional initiatives and broaden your involvement in other areas of the company.For the next year, I'd like to see you start proactively owning the full lifecycle of your work.Focus Areas for Enhanced Performance:Proactive Risk Communication (Keep it Real): Communicate potential risks and necessary pivots upward and outward early on, before they escalate into problems.Complete the Feedback Loop: Consistently finalize deliverables by communicating the final outcome and its overall impact to both the team and the customer.Prioritize Impact Over Activity (Doing What is Required): Rigorously connect daily activities to measurable outputs and desired outcomes to ensure efforts are driving real impact, thereby closing the gap between busyness and effectiveness.

**Samuel McQueen:**
I would like to see Ben be more involved within Rise8 so everyone can appreciate his work ethic and knowledge.

**Octavia Leon:**
Keep doing what you’re doing displaying your technical depth, leadership, and willingness to jump in wherever needed have been huge for the team. You’ve played a key role in getting the FORGE cyber environment running smoothly, and your ability to guide others through complex technical setups makes a big difference. You’ve shown strong ISSE-level performance and a natural ability to mentor, which really elevates those around you.
